name: Super Ninja Warrior Obstacle Course – A Crazy Kung-Fu Training School
name_original: Super Ninja Warrior Obstacle Course – A Crazy Kung-Fu Training School
description:
Test your agility in action adventure obstacle based gameplay. Make wall run or jump over insane hurdles. Escape falling down, make sneak move and show amazing parkour tricks.

Learn moves like ninja warrior and dodge the obstacles. Avoid being throw off in water by the crazy hurdles. Show Kung-Fu actions through this amazing simulation game perfect for the kids & teenagers. Rush like a super fast American Ninja in the dynamic 3D water sports. Complete all the exciting and realistic physics based levels, offering awesome challenging hurdles to compete & pass through.

Play Super Ninja Warrior Obstacle Course with insane speed and spin your way through the daring obstacles ready to throw you in water.

Download this latest sports dash game and give us reviews & feedback for further improvements.
